  • GangOfFour.state

Source code for GangOfFour.state


[docs]
class AtmState():
    name = "state"
    allowed = []



[docs]
    def goNext(self, state):
        if state.name in self.allowed:
            print("Current State: ", self, "switch to ", state.name)
            self.__class__ = state

        else:
            print("Current State: ", self, " switching to : ", state.name, "not possible!")



    def __str__(self):
        return self.name






[docs]
class Off(AtmState):
    name = "off"
    allowed = ['on']






[docs]
class On(AtmState):
    name = "on"
    allowed = ['off']






[docs]
class ATM():

    def __init__(self):
        self.current = Off()



[docs]
    def setState(self, state):
        self.current.goNext(state)








[docs]
def main():
    atm = ATM()

    atm.setState(On)
    atm.setState(Off)
    atm.setState(Off)




if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
